unnormalised: Okay, folks, traffic got you down? Well, buckle up 'cause things are changing! The Automotive Ministry just dropped some new traffic regulations, and they're aiming for smoother rides than a well-oiled Enfield.
normalised: Okay, folks, traffic got you down? Well, buckle up because things are changing! The Automotive Ministry just dropped some new traffic regulations, and they are aiming for smoother rides than a well oiled Enfield.

unnormalised: First off, fines for jumping signals in Bangalore are getting a hefty bump - think starting at Rs. 5000! Apparently, "signal discipline" is the new mantra, especially with Onam festivities right around the corner. No one wants a traffic jam spoiling their payasam enjoyment.
normalised: First off, fines for jumping signals in Bangalore are getting a hefty bump - think starting at rupee five thousand! Apparently, "signal discipline" is the new mantra, especially with Onam festivities right around the corner. No one wants a traffic jam spoiling their payasam enjoyment.

unnormalised: Also, speed limits on the Delhi-Mumbai Expressway are now officially 120 km/h for cars, but watch out for those sneaky speed cameras, they're everywhere! Plus, there's talk of mandatory helmet cams for two-wheeler riders in Chennai – all for safety, they say.
normalised: Also, speed limits on the Delhi-Mumbai Expressway are now officially one hundred and twenty kilometer per hour for cars, but watch out for those sneaky speed cameras, they are everywhere! Plus, there is talk of mandatory helmet cams for two wheeler riders in Chennai – all for safety, they say.

unnormalised: And for those of you who love a good biryani run to Hyderabad, be warned: stricter rules are being enforced regarding lane discipline on highways. So, stay in your lane and arrive safely to enjoy that Hyderabadi biryani! Basically, drive safe, folks, because the traffic police are watching, and they ain't playing around!
normalised: And for those of you who love a good biryani run to Hyderabad, be warned: stricter rules are being enforced regarding lane discipline on highways. So, stay in your lane and arrive safely to enjoy that Hyderabadi biryani! Basically, drive safe, folks, because the traffic police are watching, and they are not playing around!
